decisionTemplate.name: Fit for Dynamic Services (Fit4DS)
decisionTemplate.description: Transformation von Applikationen von konventionellen Infrastrukturen auf Cloud Infrastrukturen oder Plattformen (Cloud Readiness Assessment)mit Ber√ºcksichtigung von realen Nebenbedingungen aus DSBA und DSI

alternative.name: Dynamic Services for Business Applications (DSBA)
alternative.description: Use of the platform DSBA requiring a adaption by the application (re-platforming) without the use of shared services (extended platform strategy).

alternative.name: Dynamic Service for Infrastructure (managed service)
alternative.description: Use of the T-Systems cloud infrastructure approach. This IaaS approach includes typical infrastructure maintenance services, which have to be specified and detailed during the customer consulting. Example: Backup. For the business case, both running operating costs and transformation costs will be included.

alternative.name: Dynamic Service for Infrastructure (unmnaged service)
alternative.description: Use of the T-Systems cloud platform approach. For the business case, both running operating costs and transformation costs will be included.

alternative.name: Dedicated Solution (Classical Hosting)
alternative.description: Use of non-cloud T-Systems classical application hosting. For the busines case, all operation costs including platform services and transition will be used.

goal.name: Cost
goal.description: Total cost of ownership of one (set of) application(s) calculated on the assumed runtime.

criterion.name: Transformation and Transaction Costs
criterion.description: Costs aggregated from costs for transformation and costs for transition and migration. Use an Excel tool to calculate the overall costs value (in $).

goal.name: Quality
goal.description: operational stability of the solution, measured against customer given SLA perhaps on different levels.

criterion.name: Average Availability
criterion.description: Typical ##.##% SLA possibly measured on various levels (application, platform, infrastructure)

criterion.name: Operability with offered Services
criterion.description: How many components can be realized with the service alternative? (in %)

criterion.name: Computing Power (Landscape Peak)
criterion.description: Maximum total tpmC provided per landscape

criterion.name: Mean time to React
criterion.description: Delay until initiation of countermeasures (in hours)

criterion.name: Mean time to Recover
criterion.description: Delay until recovery is complete (in hours)

criterion.name: Product Portfolio Heterogenity
criterion.description: Number of employed products in different product groups (heterogenity index)

criterion.name: Roadmap Compliance
criterion.description: Number of detours/discrepancies from the roadmap (in %)

goal.name: Flexibility
goal.description: General ability to adapt to changed quantative requirements

criterion.name: Workload Share
criterion.description: Time to move workloads between existing operating platforms

criterion.name: Financial
criterion.description: linear impact of scaling changes to running costs (pay what you use)
